title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You take a big step in forgiving someone for a recent mistake today, even if its only yourself. Paradoxically, you may be the hardest person to absolve. You first must move past your disappointment or anger. The truth is you always run the risk of muddying your emotional clarity while you linger in negativity. When you permit yourself to repeatedly live through an old wound, you remain stuck in the process. But only you can break the old cycle and start to heal. Thankfully, forgiveness puts your life in full drive. The sooner you begin, the sooner your heart is whole. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
